SELECT p.PRODUCT_NAME, c.PRODUCT_PRICE, c.PRODUCT_COUNT, c.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, i1.IMAGE_URL FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.PRODUCT_ID = c.PRODUCT_ID JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )
